alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Jefferson; Osage (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 9:52AM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 010, 011, 020, 021, 022, 023, 034, 035, 036, AND 037... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 026, 040, and 055. * WINDS...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity in the 18 to 25 percent range. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
